name: Poly Block
description:
In this casual adventure, you are a block trying to jump as high as you can! However, your timing needs to be perfect, or else you will stumble upon enemies who can destroy you. Collect stars to buy new characters and hit double score boosts to jump higher!

How To Play?


Tap the screen to jump!
(Very Easy)


Features:
- Acquire stars to buy different characters.
- Play an infinite map and try to beat your high score
- Challenge yourself by tapping twice to do a "blind jump."
- Buy players in the Store
